part6_key3: HTML use karke clone bana kar neeche instructions ke anusaar styling karein :
part6_key4: Navgurukul ke address ka color badlein.
part6_key5: Heading tags aur paragraph tags ka text badlein.
part6_key6: `Tab`le ke kisi bhi row ka size increase karein.
part6_key7: Kisi ek bullet point ka size increase karein.
part6_key8: `Tab`le ke kisi bhi row ka background color change karein.
part6_key9: Document ka background color change karein.
part6_key10: _Assignment karne se pehle, yeh concepts padho aur samjho:_
